Chinese.name: API 网关基础示例
Chinese.description: 本示例演示 函数URL使用的基础方法，主要展示在集成响应下（通过云函数控制台创建的函数URL触发器），怎样构造返回值。
Chinese.attention: 该云函数使用了函数URL触发器，并使用了集成响应功能，返回值需要构造为Json格式。

English.name: APIGWBasicDemo
English.description: This demo uses function url trigger and SCF to build WEB backend service.It is mainly to show how to build return value.
English.attention: This demo has been used function url and integrated response function. So the return value should be json format based on the requirement.
